content:
Hi all,

I am looking at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cdmh/2019May/profiles.html#omop-to-fhir-mappings.

I believe it contains an erroneous mapping, suggesting that Person.care_site_id (OMOP) maps to BodySite.patient (FHIR). (care_site_id is a physical location corresponding to a place of care delivery; BodySite is an anatomical location.)

What is the appropriate way to report this? Or am I just missing something?

Many thanks,
matter
There is a 'Propose a change' link at the bottom of the page, that goes to create a issue in Jira. You need to request a Jira login if you do not already have one
